Obama Says It's 'Absolutely Vital' The Truth Comes Out In The Freddie Gray Case Reuters reddit 
WASHINGTON, May 1 (Reuters) - U.S. President Barack Obama on Friday said it is absolutely vital that the truth comes out in the investigation into the death of Freddie Gray, a black Baltimore man who suffered a fatal spine injury while in police custody. 
Obama said he had not yet seen the charges announced on Friday by a Maryland prosecutor against the officers who detained Gray last month.
